original_title: the God Given Talent: the Creative Life of Charles Curtis Blackwell
overview: Charles Curtis Blackwell: the Oakland poet, painter, playwright and teacher -- takes us on an intimate journey into his past and present. From his challenging upbringing in both California and Mississippi, to his current creative life -- we follow as he discusses loss, love, pain, and redemption -- all through the prism of his artistic endeavors.
title: the God Given Talent: the Creative Life of Charles Curtis Blackwell
